pr_title: Add upload variant switch for DataTransport

timeline.message: Add upload variant switch for DataTransport

timeline.bodyText: what's the default on this value? Any chance we could lose reports due to deleting it with this not set during startup or when folks first upgrade their SDK, or something?
timeline.author: jakeouellette

replies.bodyText: Good call; the default value is 0, and we should have that go through reports endpoint -- a fallback which isn't currently implemented.
replies.author: mrwillis21

replies.bodyText: I'll take that as a follow-up PR though.
replies.author: mrwillis21
